Class MedicineRequestRepository

java.lang.Object
org.example.repository.MedicineRequestRepository
public class MedicineRequestRepository extends Object
Medicine Request Repository

Handles the CRUD operations of Medicine Requests

  • Method Details

    • highestId

      public int highestId()
      Get the highest ID among all medicine requests.
      Returns:
      int The highest ID found in the medicine requests.

    • loadRequestsFromCsv

      public void loadRequestsFromCsv()
      Load medicine requests from a CSV file. Reads the CSV file, parses each line, and creates MedicineRequest objects to store in the repository.

    • saveRequestsToCsv

      public void saveRequestsToCsv()
      Save all medicine requests to a CSV file. Iterates over the list of medicine requests and writes each to the CSV file.

    • addMedicineRequest

      public void addMedicineRequest(List<String> medicineNames)
      Add a new medicine request to the repository.
      Parameters:
      medicineNames - The list of medicine names requested.

    • getAllMedicineRequests

      public List<MedicineRequest> getAllMedicineRequests()
      Get all medicine requests from the repository.
      Returns:
      List A list of all the medicine requests.

    • getMedicineRequestById

      public MedicineRequest getMedicineRequestById(int id)
      Get a medicine request by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the medicine request.
      Returns:
      MedicineRequest The medicine request with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • approveMedicineRequest

      public void approveMedicineRequest(int id)
      Approve a medicine request by changing its status to "APPROVED".
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the medicine request to approve.
